model

Interface Drawable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Ellipse, Line, Rectangle, RegularPolygon, Triangle

    public interface Drawable
    Author:
    Fawaz The Interface that enables drawing of JavaFX shapes

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void alternativeDraw(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event, double startingX, double startingY)
      Draws the "alternative" form of the shape Rectangle: Square Ellipse: Circle Triangle: Triangle Line: Line
      void draw(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event, double startingX, double startingY)
      this method defines how the shape should be drawn.
      default void EnableDrawing(javafx.scene.shape.Shape shape)
      enables drawing, and clicking on the shapes.
      javafx.beans.property.DoubleProperty getHeightProperty()
      returns the heightProperty of each shape.
      javafx.beans.property.DoubleProperty getWidthProperty()
      returns the widthProperty of each shape.

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        void draw(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event,
          double startingX,
          double startingY)
        this method defines how the shape should be drawn. each shape has a different implementation of draw();

      • alternativeDraw

        void alternativeDraw(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event,
                     double startingX,
                     double startingY)
        Draws the "alternative" form of the shape Rectangle: Square Ellipse: Circle Triangle: Triangle Line: Line
        Parameters:
        event - the event
        startingX - the X coordinate of the user mouse when a press is registered
        startingY - the Y coordinate of the user mouse when a press is registered

      • EnableDrawing

        default void EnableDrawing(javafx.scene.shape.Shape shape)
        enables drawing, and clicking on the shapes.
        Parameters:
        starti -

      • getWidthProperty

        javafx.beans.property.DoubleProperty getWidthProperty()
        returns the widthProperty of each shape. each shape has it's own width property
        Returns:
        width property of the shape

      • getHeightProperty

        javafx.beans.property.DoubleProperty getHeightProperty()
        returns the heightProperty of each shape. each shape has it's own width property
        Returns:
        height property of the shape
